title: Project 1 - Birthday Blast from the Past
description: Birthday Blast from the Past is a collaborative web application project that combines personal information with movie data to create a nostalgic journey through time.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard which displays the current weather and 5-day forecast of a given location and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by Bootstrap, jQuery, Day.js and data from the Open Weather Map API and Pixabay API

title: Studio Ghibli Quiz
description: An online quiz about the films from the animation Studio Ghibli. The quiz runs in the browser and features dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: A simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day. It features dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by jQuery and Day.js.

title: Professional README Generator
description: A command-line application that dynamically generates a professional README.md file from a user's input

title: Team Profile Generator
description: A Node.js command-line application that takes in information about employees on a software engineering team, then generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.
